explicit

Class IterationMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.IterationMethod
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IterationMethodGS, IterationMethodJacobi, IterationMethodPower

    public abstract class IterationMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that encapsulates the functionality for the different iteration methods (e.g., Power, Jacobi, Gauss-Seidel, ...).

    Provides methods as well to do the actual work in a (topological) value or interval iteration.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IterationMethod.IterationBasic
      Storage for a single solution vector
      static interface  IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter
      Interface for an object that provides the atomic steps for a value iteration in the context of interval iteration, i.e., for the interval iteration there are two IterationIntervalIter objects, one from below or from above.
      (package private) static interface  IterationMethod.IterationPostProcessor
      Functional interface for a post-processing step after an iteration that involves a pair of solution vectors.
      static interface  IterationMethod.IterationValIter
      Interface for an object that provides the basic steps for a value iteration.
      static interface  IterationMethod.SingletonSCCSolver
      Functional interface for a method that allows to determine the value for a singleton SCC in the model, given that all successor value have already been computed.
      protected class  IterationMethod.SingleVectorIterationIntervalIter
      Abstract base class for an IterationIntervalIter with a single solution vector
      protected class  IterationMethod.SingleVectorIterationValIter
      Abstract base class for an IterationValIter with a single solution vector
      protected class  IterationMethod.TwoVectorIteration
      Abstract base class for an IterationValIter / IterationIntervalIter that requires two solution vectors.

      • doValueIteration

        public ModelCheckerResult doValueIteration(ProbModelChecker mc,
                                           java.lang.String description,
                                           IterationMethod.IterationValIter iteration,
                                           IntSet unknownStates,
                                           long startTime,
                                           ExportIterations iterationsExport)
                                    throws PrismException
        Perform the actual work of a value iteration, i.e., iterate until convergence or abort.
        Parameters:
        mc - ProbModelChecker (for log and settings)
        description - (for logging)
        iteration - The iteration object
        unknownStates - The set of unknown states, i.e., whose value should be determined
        startTime - The start time (for logging purposes, obtained from a call to System.currentTimeMillis())
        iterationsExport - an ExportIterations object (optional, ignored if null)
        Returns:
        a ModelChecker result with the solution vector and statistics
        Throws:
        PrismException - on non-convergence (if mc.errorOnNonConverge is set)

      • doTopologicalValueIteration

        public ModelCheckerResult doTopologicalValueIteration(ProbModelChecker mc,
                                                      java.lang.String description,
                                                      SCCInfo sccs,
                                                      IterationMethod.IterationValIter iterator,
                                                      IterationMethod.SingletonSCCSolver singletonSCCSolver,
                                                      long startTime,
                                                      ExportIterations iterationsExport)
                                               throws PrismException
        Perform the actual work of a topological value iteration, i.e., iterate until convergence or abort.
        Parameters:
        mc - ProbModelChecker (for log and settings)
        description - (for logging)
        sccs - The information about the SCCs and topological order
        iteration - The iteration object
        singletonSCCSolver - The solver for singleton SCCs
        startTime - The start time (for logging purposes, obtained from a call to System.currentTimeMillis())
        iterationsExport - an ExportIterations object (optional, ignored if null)
        Returns:
        a ModelChecker result with the solution vector and statistics
        Throws:
        PrismException - on non-convergence (if mc.errorOnNonConverge is set)

      • doIntervalIteration

        public ModelCheckerResult doIntervalIteration(ProbModelChecker mc,
                                              java.lang.String description,
                                              IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter below,
                                              IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter above,
                                              IntSet unknownStates,
                                              long timer,
                                              ExportIterations iterationsExport)
                                       throws PrismException
        Perform the actual work of an interval iteration, i.e., iterate until convergence or abort.
        Parameters:
        mc - ProbModelChecker (for log and settings)
        description - Description (for logging)
        below - The iteration object for the iteration from below
        above - The iteration object for the iteration from above
        unknownStates - The set of unknown states, i.e., whose value should be determined
        startTime - The start time (for logging purposes, obtained from a call to System.currentTimeMillis())
        iterationsExport - an ExportIterations object (optional, ignored if null)
        Returns:
        a ModelChecker result with the solution vector and statistics
        Throws:
        PrismException - on non-convergence (if mc.errorOnNonConverge is set)

      • doTopologicalIntervalIteration

        public ModelCheckerResult doTopologicalIntervalIteration(ProbModelChecker mc,
                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                         SCCInfo sccs,
                                                         IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter below,
                                                         IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter above,
                                                         IterationMethod.SingletonSCCSolver singletonSCCSolver,
                                                         long timer,
                                                         ExportIterations iterationsExport)
                                                  throws PrismException
        Perform the actual work of a topological interval iteration, i.e., iterate until convergence or abort.
        Parameters:
        mc - ProbModelChecker (for log and settings)
        description - Description (for logging)
        sccs - The information about the SCCs and topological order
        below - The iteration object for the value iteration from below
        above - The iteration object for the value iteration from above
        singletonSCCSolver - The solver for singleton SCCs
        startTime - The start time (for logging purposes, obtained from a call to System.currentTimeMillis())
        iterationsExport - an ExportIterations object (optional, ignored if null)
        Returns:
        a ModelChecker result with the solution vector and statistics
        Throws:
        PrismException - on non-convergence (if mc.errorOnNonConverge is set)

      • intervalIterationCheckForProblems

        private static void intervalIterationCheckForProblems(double[] lower,
                                                      double[] upper,
                                                      java.util.PrimitiveIterator.OfInt states)
                                               throws PrismException
        Compares the current lower and upper solution vectors in an interval iteration and throws an exception if lower bound values are larger than upper bound values, as this indicates problems.
        Parameters:
        lower - the current lower iteration solution vector
        upper - the current upper iteration solution vector
        states - iterator over the states in question
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • twoVectorPostProcessing

        public static void twoVectorPostProcessing(double[] solnOld,
                                           double[] solnNew,
                                           IntSet states,
                                           boolean fromBelow,
                                           boolean enforceMonotonicity,
                                           boolean checkMonotonicity)
                                    throws PrismException
        Perform a post-processing for a two-vector value iteration.
        Parameters:
        solnOld - the previous solution vector
        solnNew - the newly computed solution vector
        states - the relevant set of states
        fromBelow - are we iterating from below?
        enforceMonotonicity - if true, enforces monotonicity
        checkMonotonicity - if true, checks for monotonicity (and throws error when non-monotonic)
        Throws:
        PrismException
